#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 Last 16 : Brazil , Belgium advance at expense of Mexico , Japan
#Text=Thursday , July 5 , 2018
#Text=On Monday , Brazil defeated Mexico 2 – 0 and Belgium defeated Japan 3 – 2 in the FIFA football World Cup in the Last 16 knockout phase .
#Text=Brazil is now scheduled to play Belgium in the quarter-finals .
#Text=Brazil vs Mexico
#Text=Brazil faced Mexico in Samara Arena .
#Text=Mexico had greater ball possession in the match .
#Text=Before the half-hour mark , Neymar , Thiago Silva , Gabriel Jesus and Philippe Coutinho had attempts for goal but their attempts were blocked or saved by Mexican goalkeeper Guillermo Ochoa .
#Text=Both sides were tied goalless at the halftime .
#Text=In the second half , Brazil opened the scoring in the 51st minute when Neymar scored a close-range shot from Willian 's assist .
#Text=Hirving Lozano and Carlos Vela had their attempts for equalising for Mexico but were unsuccessful .
#Text=Chicharito was substituted out in the 60th minute .
#Text=Brazil made two substitutions in the final ten minutes of the 90-minute game , as Fernandinho and Roberto Firmino were substituted in for Paulinho and Coutinho .
#Text=In the 88th minute , just two minutes after coming on the field , Firmino scored a goal , doubling the lead for Brazil .
#Text=The South Americans won the match 2 – 0 .
#Text=After the match , Mexico 's coach Juan Carlos Osorio said , " Being able to play at such a level with a team like Brazil , it shows Mexico is a good team .
#Text=I do feel that it was a tragedy but I have to accept the defeat as a fact .
#Text="
